name: MCPoker
description: Go through a 100 Day Minecraft playthrough to get a random set of statistics, then bet with friends to see who has the highest stat. Originally envisioned by TangoTek and EthosLab on the Hermitcraft SMP during Season 7.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not persistently store any data or metadata about users.
install_msg: Thanks for installing the cog. I'm in the Cog Support server if you need help with anything.
author: YamiKaitou
falrek_games
